content: please note that there is a free video tutorial for this mini turtle please follow the link to watch it - https //youtu be/rw3adzbgade if you need a pdf file with detailed step-by-step instructions and lots of pictures then you can purchase it you can use it to make a keychain or a brooch or bookmark or just hang it on your rear view mirror the pattern contains 10 pages with the 52 pictures of the parts of the toy and the process of assembling but does not include crochet learning skill level easy ⭐️ basic crocheting skills will be needed chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet popcorn crochet increasing decrease flo blo materials and tools you need yarn - beige colos crochet hook stuffing black and brown embroidery threads sewing needle you can use any yarn and suitable hook size but remember that the finished toy might differ in the measures mentioned above if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to contact me thank you for respecting my work happy crocheting * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * this pattern is copyright protected and is for personal use only no part of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form
